reference.title: Teams Administration Roles
reference.shortdesc: Microsoft Teams can have multiple administration roles. This highlights each role, what the role can do and which tools the admin can use.

strow.stentry: Manages the meetings, voice controls, organization-wide settings and reports.
Manages the calling and meeting features in Teams.
Supports and assists with any communications issues in Teams to help with quality control.
Manages devices to use with Teams software.
Manages the telephone and voice features in the Teams software.
